name: Gargolite
description:
Made in three days for Ludum Dare 45. Theme: You Start with Nothing

Please rate us: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/gargolite

You start with nothing to help you protect The Orb from the gargoyles. Turn them into stone and build a tiny fortress in this top-down defense shooter.

You were put in The Cursed Castle Of Gargolite in order to protect The Ancient Magical Orb of Light. Every night the gargoyles come in order to destroy it. You must keep it safe, or else…

Credits

  • Programming - Ori Brusilovsky
  • Art - Stav Goldstein
  • Music & Sound Design -Alon Kaplan, Ety Terry Hermann
  • Font - @somepx

Built with Godot Game Engine.
